The Lakeland revival that was promoted by Randy Clark, Cheyenne, Bill Johnson, John Arnott, Heidi Baker, Bob Jones, and was broadcast live 24-7 on God TV fell apart within a month of this video.  Once everyone discovered that Todd Bentley was a total fraud on national TV, who also abandoned his wife and young children.

He told us she is far too weak to talk to us.  He did send us some of his wife's medical records from a clinic in Tijuana, Mexico, but she apparently insisted on obscuring the clinic's name and the names of the doctors.  And so, not a single miracle claim of Bentley's could be verified.
